data.message: Recently I cannot post articles from outside sources to Facebook.  I get a response that I have to "grant Facebook permission" and I have no idea how to do this and cannot find out anywhere on the site.  Can anyone tell me how I can do this?  This only happened within the last month and I had previously been able to do this with no problems.

replies.message: Hey Steve. We’re sorry to hear that you’re experiencing issues. Could you please provide any additional information? For example, are you trying to post from a mobile device? The more information you can provide, the better we'll be able to assist you. Thanks! -Hailey
There is an email address to contact Facebook Staff @ www.Facebook.com
